name: MAYBELLINE Serum Lipstick, Hydrating Lip Makeup with 8HRs of Lip Plumping Moisture with Hyaluronic Acid + Oil Blend, Crop Top (Light Nude Pink Matte)
short_description: 8HR Plumping Moisture: Enjoy 8 hours of lip plumping moisture with our innovative long lasting lipstick formula. Formulated with an oil blend and hyaluronic acid for serum-level care and lips that look smoother and feel conditioned. Glides on effortlessly

16 Flattering Lip Stick Shades: Find your shade with 16 flattering satin and matte lipstick finishes. From subtle everyday nude lipstick to bold pops of color, this Maybelline Lipstick range offers a diverse spectrum designed to be skin tone-enhancing

Maybelline Has What You Need: Create any look with foundation, BB cream, concealer and highlighter for the perfect canvas, eye shadow, brow pencil, mascara and eyeliner for any eye look and lip products, from matte lipstick to au natural lip gloss
Remove Maybelline Makeup With Micellar Water: Use Garnier Micellar Water as a gentle makeup remover at night, and as a facial cleanser in the morning to prep skin for Maybelline makeup
product_description: It’s lush color so comfortable, it feels like you. Formula with an oil blend and hyaluronic acid for serum-level care. 8HR plumping moisture. 16 matte + satin shades. All-day wear. Sculpt, shape, and define your lips with effortless precision. The unique lip-hugging bullet shape allows for precise application and glides on smoothly, making it easy to achieve your desired lip look.

name: L.A. COLORS Pout Chaser Lipstick, Vontage CLIPC843
short_description: BOLD, VINTAGE VIBES THAT LAST: Rock timeless glamour with rich, vibrant color and a smooth, long-lasting formula that keeps your lips looking flawless from day to night.
CREAMY TEXTURE: Enjoy a smooth, effortless application that glides on comfortably, making it easy to achieve vibrant, long-lasting color without breaking the bank.

ALL-DAY COLOR THAT LASTS: The Pout Chaser Lipstick in Vintage glides on smoothly and stays put through all your daily adventures, so you can keep your confidence and your color intact from morning to night.
CRUELTY-FREE ALWAYS: Enjoy the creamy texture of Pout Chaser Lipstick knowing it’s crafted with care and never tested on animals—a cruelty-free choice that fits your budget and values.
product_description: The Pout Chaser Lipstick - Vintage offers a vibrant and versatile lip color experience with its richly pigmented formula available in 23 shades plus a clear lip balm. Designed to suit any mood or occasion, this lipstick features a blend of creamy satin and soft shimmer finishes that not only provide stunning color payoff but also hydrate the lips. Key ingredients like Aloe Leaf Extract and Vitamin E work together to nourish and moisturize, ensuring your lips stay smooth and comfortable throughout the day. Beyond its beautiful shades, this lipstick is cruelty-free, paraben-free, and vegan, making it a conscientious choice for beauty lovers. Whether you prefer a subtle nude like “Nudie Nude” or a bold pop of pink with “Attention,” the Pout Chaser Lipstick lets you effortlessly switch up your look while keeping your lips healthy and hydrated.
